02-20-2008, 06:21 AM #1 Jeanne View Profile View Forum Posts View Blog Entries View Articles Registered User Join Date Apr 2001 Posts 144 PostIt questions and answers http://www.sophiesspace.com/sophiestuff.aspx?b=3M
How many pads come in the new Post-it Notes Cabinet Pack #654-18SPCP? 18 Which of these are available in Post-it Cabinet Packs? all of these What type of paper is NOT available on a Post-it Self-Stick Easel Pad? assorted pastel Buy Post-it Pop-up Notes #DS330-SSVA and you can get what for FREE? pop up note dispenser Buy the Post-it Flag Value Pack #680-RYBGVA and you get what for FREE? post it durable tabs What item is included for FREE in the package of the #654-12AP-VA? postit flag pen How many Post-it Arrow Flags with Desk Grip Dispenser model #680-HVAR? 200 What are the dimensions of the #558-BBS Post-it Sticky Cork Board? 22 by 18 Last edited by Jeanne; 02-20-2008 at 06:28 AM . Reason: Better title and adding link Reply With Quote 02-20-2008, 07:12 AM #2 laskawolf View Profile View Forum Posts View Blog Entries View Articles Registered User Join Date Jan 2008 Posts 7 More questions... What is the smallest size post-it note? 1 1/2 x 2 Reply With Quote 02-20-2008, 09:25 AM #3 Veruca74 View Profile View Forum Posts View Blog Entries View Articles 1/2007 Join Date Jun 2003 Location NYC or Cincy, OH Posts 2,288 More questions:
How many sheets are contained in a Post-it Super Sticky Table Top Easel Pad? 20
What is the smallest available Post-it Note? 1 1/2"x 2"
Which of these are available in Post-it Cabinet Packs? All of these.
What size Post-it Notes are perfect for making lists? 4"x 6"
What is a great use for Post-it Flag product #284-ARR3? Pinpoint a specific date on your calendar.
What type of paper can you get on a Post-it Self-Stick Easel Pad? Both of the above.
What brand fastener is provided for use in putting the Post-it Sticky Cork and Dry-Erase Board on the wall? Command Fasteners
Which of these Post-it Specialty Note shapes are available in both Pads and Cubes? All. Reply With Quote 02-20-2008, 10:13 AM #4 Yellowcanary View Profile View Forum Posts View Blog Entries View Articles Registered User Join Date Jan 2006 Location Boston suburb Posts 1,310 I guess they were too overwhelmed with people claiming their prizes last month. Now, when you answer all the questions correctly, all you get is a chance to spin to win one of the 3 prizes, an you get only 1 spin a day. Reply With Quote 02-20-2008, 10:39 AM #5 amy0123 View Profile View Forum Posts View Blog Entries View Articles Registered User Join Date Oct 2006 Location a little town in Pa Posts 1,304 OHHH- I wanna pop that Sophie chick!! Reply With Quote 02-20-2008, 10:46 AM #6 BluesBabe View Profile View Forum Posts View Blog Entries View Articles Registered User Join Date Jun 2006 Posts 295 Originally Posted by amy0123 OHHH- I wanna pop that Sophie chick!! Thanks I was getting wooried about me because I wanted to slap her. Reply With Quote 02-20-2008, 10:52 AM #7 WifeofPete View Profile View Forum Posts View Blog Entries View Articles Registered User Join Date Nov 2005 Location WV Posts 353 I still never received my prize from last month. Anybody receive theirs? Reply With Quote 02-20-2008, 11:35 AM #8 dtanner View Profile View Forum Posts View Blog Entries View Articles Registered User Join Date Jul 2005 Location Georgia Posts 637 Yep! I got my Portable Note Dispenser yesterday. Very cute! Reply With Quote 02-20-2008, 08:06 PM #9 kross1026 View Profile View Forum Posts View Blog Entries View Articles Registered User Join Date Jan 2006 Location Maryland (gltkar@hotmail.com) Posts 590 Beware- some of the answers above get the"oops"response...
but- you can skip all the questions by clicking on the spin now option (located towards the top right of the page).
I am still waiting to get last round's prizes Reply With Quote 02-21-2008, 09:08 AM #10 BluesBabe View Profile View Forum Posts View Blog Entries View Articles Registered User Join Date Jun 2006 Posts 295 Originally Posted by Veruca74 More questions:
How many sheets are contained in a Post-it Super Sticky Table Top Easel Pad? 20
What is the smallest available Post-it Note? 1 1/2"x 2"
Which of these are available in Post-it Cabinet Packs? All of these.
What size Post-it Notes are perfect for making lists? 4"x 6"
What is a great use for Post-it Flag product #284-ARR3? Pinpoint a specific date on your calendar.
What type of paper can you get on a Post-it Self-Stick Easel Pad? Both of the above.
What brand fastener is provided for use in putting the Post-it Sticky Cork and Dry-Erase Board on the wall? Command Fasteners
Which of these Post-it Specialty Note shapes are available in both Pads and Cubes? All. This one comes up oops (What brand fastener is provided for use in putting the Post-it Sticky Cork and Dry-Erase Board on the wall? Command Fasteners) Even though its correct.
Also a new question not posted: But do you know what size notes come in a B330-BD? 3 in by 3in
Good luck! Reply With Quote
